label: 太政官
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the Council of State established by the ritsuryô codes to advise the monarch and promulgate his orders. It included ministers, counselors, and advisors who by Heian times came to be known as “senior nobles” (kugyô 公卿). [律令]
